Yingxi Ji

is a graphic designer who specializes in print, publication digital media, and branding. Originally from Suzhou, China, she studied graphic design at Minneapolis College of Art and Design (2014 - 2017) and received her BFA degree from there in May 2017. Currently working and living in Minneapolis, Minnesota. PMH Advertising Agency where she currently works for. Has worked for DesignWorks and BENWU STUDIO (Shanghai/ Beijing) before.
